alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 3:32AM PST until December 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. Strongest winds in the mountains and foothills. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Cuyama Valley and San Luis Obispo County Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains
